explains: n. 精通，熟练掌握；控制，驾驭
wordGroup: mastery learning 掌握学习；通达学习；精熟学习

sentences.en: She has mastery of several languages.
He doesn't have mastery of the basic rules of grammar.
sentences.cn: 他没有掌握基本的语法规则。

sentences.en: Later, I developed a broader theory of what separates the two general classes of learners helpless versus mastery oriented.
sentences.cn: 后来，我发展了一个更广泛的理论来区分无助型学习者和掌握型学习者。
